title: Mentor Interview
Interview Descriptions: Smooth and I was able to create a really good schedule while also learning about the company before making my decision. They listened to my concerns and aligned with them very well.

title: Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Youth Speaks (Oakland, CA) in Jan 2012
Interview Descriptions: I was asked to share lesson plan, creative work of my own, and answer questions.  It was a bit intimidating as Youth Speaks has such a great reputation.  However, the interviewers were fairly friendly and compassionate.  Lengthy and thorough process.
Interview Questions: What drew you to this work?
